channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- vGPU software
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- vGPU software

item.title: CVE-2023-25517|2024-08-02T11:25:19.070Z -- nvidia -- vgpu%20software
item.description: NVIDIA vGPU software contains a vulnerability in the Virtual GPU Manager (vGPU plugin), where a guest OS may be able to control resources for which it is not authorized, which may lead to information disclosure and data tampering.
